text: Nagra nehuana megi'a vahe'mo'za monko avu'ava nehazampi, vahe'mofo zanku kezamanunu nehaza vahepi, zamagraguke nentahiza vahepi, krunage hu'za musufanesaza vahepi, havi anumzante mono hunentaza vahe'ene tragotetma omanihogura nosue. Tamagrama amanahu vahe'ma zamatre varegahunema hanutma, ama mopa atrevagareho.
